question: The recently launched "Sachet" portal by the RBI aims to:
option1: curb illegal collection of money by companies
option2: avail various loan schemes to students
option3: enhance inclusive access of credit to the excluded segments of the society
option4: provide financial assistance to technically qualified, trained and experienced entrepreneurs for setting up new viable industrial projects
answer: curb illegal collection of money by companies
explanation:
First option is the correct answer
Recently, the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) launched the "Sachet" portal to curb illegal collection of money by companies. This website will enable public to obtain information regarding entities that accept deposits, lodge complaints and also share information regarding illegal acceptance of deposits.
